integration_yaml_migration.title: Nederlandse Spoorwegen YAML configuration migrated
integration_yaml_migration.description: Your Nederlandse Spoorwegen integration configuration has been automatically migrated from YAML to the new config entry format. To complete this migration: 1) Verify the integration is working correctly in the integrations page, 2) Remove the 'nederlandse_spoorwegen:' section from your configuration.yaml file, 3) Restart Home Assistant to clear this notification. The integration will continue to work normally during this transition.

platform_yaml_migration.title: Nederlandse Spoorwegen platform configuration migrated
platform_yaml_migration.description: Your Nederlandse Spoorwegen sensor platform configuration has been automatically migrated to the new config entry format. To complete this migration: 1) Verify the integration is working correctly in the integrations page, 2) Remove the 'nederlandse_spoorwegen' platform from your sensor configuration in configuration.yaml, 3) Restart Home Assistant to clear this notification. The integration will continue to work normally during this transition.
